text: Michael Gordon Wygant (born 1936, Newburgh, New York) is a former American diplomat who was the head of the Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe (OSCE) Armenia office and was the first Ambassador to the Federated States of Micronesia. Wygant graduated from Dartmouth College. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Dartmouth College alumni Category:Ambassadors of the United States to the Federated States of Micronesia Category:American diplomats Category:People from Newburgh, New York Category:Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe Category:Living people
title: Michael Gordon Wygant
